alert.note: Alert for Butler (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 12:59AM CST until March 07 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUTLER COUNTY... At 1259 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southeast of Harviell to near Corning, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Neelyville, Qulin and Fisk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CST for southeastern Missouri. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
